body:
So, I recently installed minechat. I was wondering how I can connect to avicus with it
Do I use the IP avic.us, or another ip EX: mczone01.avic.us
Please help
I'm a noob at this
body_tagged:
So, I recently installed minechat. I was wondering how I can connect to avicus with it

I'm a noob at this
title: Minechat

replies.body:
Well what I do is just connect to "avic.us", and then type /server mczone01 (or any server) to connect.
That should work! :)
replies.body_tagged:
Well what I do is just connect to "avic.us", and then type /server mczone01 (or any server) to connect.
That should work! :)

replies.body: Use IP: mczone01.avic.us wait for a while to connect then use /server !
replies.body_tagged: Use IP: mczone01.avic.us wait for a while to connect then use /server !
